ygData.subject: Re: Amulet of Order
ygData.msgSnippet: i heard somewhere that possibly charisma may make the songs get resisted less.  i don t think it helps the intensity of the songs, but the resistance theory
ygData.messageBody:
i heard somewhere that possibly charisma may make the songs get resisted
less. i don't think it helps the intensity of the songs, but the resistance
theory makes sense. i read a message that someone tested this and got
resisted a lot less, but i have not tested it myself.

Shada Silverleaf, level 38 bard, Mith Marr

-----Original Message-----
From: Roop Dirump [mailto:roop@...]
Sent: Monday, May 24, 1999 12:44 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Amulet of Order


From: "Roop Dirump" <roop@...>

Ah, and since it was my original mistake, let me clarify the amulet is
actually called the Order of Thunder.

I will test the thing tonight, since my charisma is only 90 without it.
Will greatly disapoint me if the added charisma boost actually doesn't help
in any way! Was using it more in hopes of it helping songs somehow.

One, of course, can store it in the bank if it is first placed in a bag.

Roop
